# PED::SET_PED_COMBAT_ATTRIBUTES

## Summary
Activate or deactivate the combat attributes, flags can be or'ed together

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **COMBAT_ATTRIBUTE** combatAttribute
* **BOOL** activeSkill

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
